metadata.name: Renamed BrowserCore.EXE Execution
metadata.comment: Detects process creation with a renamed BrowserCore.exe (used to extract Azure tokens)

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('browsercore.exe') AND NOT endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\browsercore.exe')))

output.summary: Detects process creation with a renamed BrowserCore.exe (used to extract Azure tokens)
